005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ast.Paragraph;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
017
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.Set;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
023
024public class SuppressPTagExtension
025    implements HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension {
026
027  /**
028   * Construct a new extension instance.
029   *
030   * @return the instance
031   */
032  public static SuppressPTagExtension newInstance() {
033    return new SuppressPTagExtension();
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
038    // do nothing
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
043    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new PTagNodeRenderer.Factory());
044  }
045
046  static class PTagNodeRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
047
048    @Override
049    public @Nullable Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
050      return Collections.singleton(
051          new NodeRenderingHandler<>(Paragraph.class, this::render));
052    }
053
054    protected void render(
055        @NonNull Paragraph node,
056        @NonNull NodeRendererContext context,
057        @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull HtmlWriter html) {
058      context.renderChildren(node);
059    }
060
061    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
062
063      @Override
064      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
065        return new PTagNodeRenderer();
066      }
067
068    }
069  }
070
071}
